attributes.action: By signing this petition, i show my anger and loss of confidence in government.
attributes.additional_details:
Incredibly frustrated, this is my 3rd attempt at creating a petition to address #Partygate where all have been rejected and i feel sensored. I call for parliament as a whole to debate the behaviours of government that have broken public trust and find a way forward to rebuild the faith in this democracy.

 By signing this, i the signee wish to show my anger and loss of confidence in the government. Iam not allowed to call a vote of no confidence despite my wanting one.
attributes.background: Petitions asking for a vote of no confidence in an individual Minister or the Government as a whole are against petitioning rules. This means the public has no way to voice its anger or distrust in standing government. The purpose of this petition if to allow the public a voice.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
